title: Sister O'dell, Obama, Surveillance Videos, Junior Sports Talk and more.
itunes:title: Sister O'dell, Obama, Surveillance Videos, Junior Sports Talk and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Uncle Steve is singing Al Green in the quarantine. Sister O'dell is having wig problems. The CLO gives some advice for a sexless marriage. Michael Jordan's daughter has some words to say about his documentary. Trump's pettiness towards Obama continues. New surveillance videos show several people trespassing on the same property visited by Ahmaud Arbery. Junior's Sports Talk revolves around Jordan, Kobe and Lebron. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve piggy backs on the power thinking discussion from yesterday and adds more gems, plus more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
